title: Buttons [Sell] and [Buy] are hidden on the price widget of the trading instrument. Buttons appear when 'hidden' is deleted  in the line of code 'class='sharesName__price flex js_prices hidden' in Console
expected result: Buttons [Sell] and [Buy] are on the price widget of the trading instrument
actual result: Buttons [Sell] and [Buy] are hidden on the price widget of the trading instrument
author: Ruslana Kudelko
